title: Tucker Max: How to Turn Your Ideas Into Books Without Actually Writing Them
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: Tucker Max, bestselling author of "I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell", talks about the inspiration behind founding his new company, Book in a Box, and how they’re helping people turn ideas into books.
